verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man שִׂ֥ים <WH7760> set פָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> thy face עַל־ <WH5921> against הַ֣ר <WH2022> against mount שֵׂעִ֑יר <WH8165> Seir וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> and prophesy עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> against

וְאָמַ֣רְתָּ <WH559> And say לּ֗וֹ כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> unto it Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> behold אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> I am against הַר־ <WH2022> Behold O mount שֵׂעִ֑יר <WH8165> Seir וְנָטִ֤יתִי <WH5186> I [am] against thee and I will stretch out יָדִי֙ <WH3027> mine hand עָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> against וּנְתַתִּ֖יךָ <WH5414> against thee and I will make שְׁמָמָ֥ה <WH8077> desolate וּמְשַׁמָּֽה׃ <WH4923> thee most

עָרֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5892> thy cities חָרְבָּ֣ה <WH2723> waste אָשִׂ֔ים <WH7760> I will lay וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you שְׁמָמָ֣ה <WH8077> and thou shalt be desolate תִֽהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> will become וְיָדַעְתָּ֖ <WH3045> and thou shalt know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD

יַ֗עַן <WH3282> Because הֱי֤וֹת <WH1961> have had לְךָ֙ אֵיבַ֣ת <WH342> hatred עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> Because thou hast had a perpetual וַתַּגֵּ֥ר <WH5064> and hast shed אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> [the blood of] the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel עַל־ <WH5921> unto יְדֵי־ <WH3027> by the force חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> of the sword בְּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> in the time אֵידָ֔ם <WH343> of their calamity בְּעֵ֖ת <WH6256> in the time עֲוֹ֥ן <WH5771> [that their] iniquity קֵֽץ׃ <WH7093> [had] an end

לָכֵ֣ן <WH3651> therefore חַי־ <WH2416> Therefore [as] I live אָ֗נִי <WH589> I נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3068> GOD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לְדָ֥ם <WH1818> thee unto blood אֶעֶשְׂךָ֖ <WH6213> I will prepare וְדָ֣ם <WH1818> and blood יִרְדֲּפֶ֑ךָ <WH7291> shall pursue אִם־ <WH518> thee sith לֹ֥א <WH3808> not דָ֛ם <WH1818> blood שָׂנֵ֖אתָ <WH8130> thou hast not hated וְדָ֥ם <WH1818> even blood יִרְדֲּפֶֽךָ׃ <WH7291> shall pursue

וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <WH5414> Thus will I make אֶת־ <WH853> הַ֣ר <WH2022> mount שֵׂעִ֔יר <WH8165> Seir לְשִֽׁמְמָ֖ה <WH8077> most וּשְׁמָמָ֑ה <WH8077> desolate וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <WH3772> and cut off מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> who עֹבֵ֥ר <WH5674> from it him that passeth out וָשָֽׁב׃ <WH7725> and him that returneth

וּמִלֵּאתִ֥י <WH4390> And I will fill אֶת־ <WH853> הָרָ֖יו <WH2022> his mountains חֲלָלָ֑יו <WH2491> with his slain גִּבְעוֹתֶ֤יךָ <WH1389> [men] in thy hills וְגֵאוֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH1516> and in thy valleys וְכָל־ <WH3605> all אֲפִיקֶ֔יךָ <WH650> and in all thy rivers חַלְלֵי־ <WH2491> that are slain חֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> with the sword יִפְּל֥וּ <WH5307> shall they fall בָהֶֽם׃

שִֽׁמְמ֤וֹת <WH8077> desolations עוֹלָם֙ <WH5769> thee perpetual אֶתֶּנְךָ֔ <WH5414> I will make וְעָרֶ֖יךָ <WH5892> and thy cities לֹ֣א <WH3808> not [תֵישַׁבְנָה כ] (תָשֹׁ֑בְנָה <WH3427> abide ק) וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD

יַ֣עַן <WH3282> Because אֲ֠מָרְךָ <WH559> Because thou hast said אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁנֵ֨י <WH8147> These two הַגּוֹיִ֜ם <WH1471> nations וְאֶת־ <WH853> שְׁתֵּ֧י <WH8147> and these two הָאֲרָצ֛וֹת <WH776> countries לִ֥י תִהְיֶ֖ינָה <WH1961> become וִֽירַשְׁנ֑וּהָ <WH3423> shall be mine and we will possess וַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> it whereas the LORD שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> was there הָיָֽה׃ <WH1961> become

לָכֵ֣ן <WH3651> therefore חַי־ <WH2416> Therefore [as] I live אָ֗נִי <WH589> I נְאֻם֮ <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3069> GOD וְעָשִׂ֗יתִי <WH6213> I will even do כְּאַפְּךָ֙ <WH639> according to thine anger וּכְקִנְאָ֣תְךָ֔ <WH7068> and according to thine envy אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשִׂ֔יתָה <WH6213> which thou hast used מִשִּׂנְאָתֶ֖יךָ <WH8135> out of thy hatred בָּ֑ם וְנוֹדַ֥עְתִּי <WH3045> against them and I will make myself known בָ֖ם כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אֶשְׁפְּטֶֽךָ׃ <WH8199> among them when I have judged

וְֽיָדַעְתָּ֮ <WH3045> And thou shalt know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD שָׁמַ֣עְתִּי ׀ <WH8085> [and that] I have heard אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all נָאָֽצוֹתֶ֗יךָ <WH5007> all thy blasphemies אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אָמַ֛רְתָּ <WH559> which thou hast spoken עַל־ <WH5921> against הָרֵ֥י <WH2022> against the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֣ר ׀ <WH559> saying [שָׁמֵמָה כ] (שָׁמֵ֑מוּ <WH8074> make amazed ק) לָ֥נוּ נִתְּנ֖וּ <WH5414> they are given לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <WH402> us to consume

וַתַּגְדִּ֤ילוּ <WH1431> ye have boasted עָלַי֙ <WH5921> against בְּפִיכֶ֔ם <WH6310> Thus with your mouth וְהַעְתַּרְתֶּ֥ם <WH6280> against me and have multiplied עָלַ֖י <WH5921> against דִּבְרֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1697> your words אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I שָׁמָֽעְתִּי׃ <WH8085> against me I have heard ס

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD כִּשְׂמֹ֙חַ֙ <WH8055> rejoiceth כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> When the whole earth שְׁמָמָ֖ה <WH8077> thee desolate אֶעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> I will make לָּֽךְ׃

כְּשִׂמְחָ֨תְךָ֜ <WH8057> As thou didst rejoice לְנַחְלַ֧ת <WH5159> at the inheritance בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel עַ֥ל <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> it שָׁמֵ֖מָה <WH8074> because it was desolate כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> so אֶעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> so will I do לָּ֑ךְ שְׁמָמָ֨ה <WH8077> unto thee thou shalt be desolate תִֽהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> become הַר־ <WH2022> O mount שֵׂעִיר֙ <WH8165> Seir וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֱד֣וֹם <WH123> and all Idumea כֻּלָּ֔הּ <WH3605> all וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> [even] all of it and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD פ
